title: All-Star Fruit Racing + DLC
body:
All-Star Fruit Racing + DLC


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Racing, 3D, Karts
Companies: 3DClouds / PQube
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 3.3 GB
Repack Size: from 1.7 GB [Selective Download]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on AllStar.Fruit.Racing-CODEX ISO release: codex-allstar.fruit.racing.iso (3,548,971,008 bytes)
  • Yogscast Exclusive DLC included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of unused console videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.3 to 1.7/2.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 2-3 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 4 GB
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Go bananas for a jaw-dropping, lightning-fast kart racer for all ages and abilities! All-Star Fruit Racing propels players into vibrant worlds filled with incredible action: drift through looping bends, soar over monumental jumps and defy gravity itself around tubular tracks in an explosively colorful racer bursting with championships, modes and awe-inspiring sights!
